entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Weyburn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:42 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Weyburn 03:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Fog. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
